Package FluxBus.entities

Class Charter

  • java.lang.Object
    • FluxBus.entities.Busride
      • FluxBus.entities.Charter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Busride>
    public class Charter
extends Busride
    A chartered bus in the fix bus management system (FluxBus).

    When a bus is chartered, a certain mileage is included.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double includedMileage
      The mileage included in this chartered bus must be non-negative.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Charter​(java.lang.String rideID, java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination, DateTime departure, DateTime arrival)
      Creates a chartered bus with an id, an origin, a destination and both departure and arrival.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getIncludedMileage()
      Gets the included mileage of this chartered bus.
      void setIncludedMileage​(double includedMileage)
      Sets the included mileage of this chartered bus.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Calls super class toString method and adds includedMileage to it.

      • Methods declared in class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • includedMileage

        private double includedMileage
        The mileage included in this chartered bus must be non-negative.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Charter

        public Charter​(java.lang.String rideID,
               java.lang.String origin,
               java.lang.String destination,
               DateTime departure,
               DateTime arrival)
        Creates a chartered bus with an id, an origin, a destination and both departure and arrival.
        Parameters:
        rideID - the id of this chartered bus
        origin - the origin of this chartered bus
        destination - the destination of this chartered bus
        departure - the scheduled departure date and time of this chartered bus
        arrival - the scheduled arrival date and time of this chartered bus
        See Also:
        Busride

    • Method Detail

      • getIncludedMileage

        public double getIncludedMileage()
        Gets the included mileage of this chartered bus.
        Returns:
        the included mileage

      • setIncludedMileage

        public void setIncludedMileage​(double includedMileage)
        Sets the included mileage of this chartered bus.

        The mileage must be non-negative, else an IllegalArgumentException is thrown with a custom message.

        Parameters:
        includedMileage - the mileage to set

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Calls super class toString method and adds includedMileage to it.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Busride
        See Also:
        Object.toString()
